TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Malawi, title = Malawi, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malawi} }

S.FORM: Malawi hya' ga cyux maki' tay 13 30 S, 34 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 118,484 sq km (maki' tay 100ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 94,080 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 24,404 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 18,570,321. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 59.20 , lhlahuy hya' ga 34 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 6.80 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Lilongwe. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 6 na tay mtzyu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Peter Mutharika, aring ryax 31 squ byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2014 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
